alert.note: Alert for Austin; Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, southeastern Burleson, northwestern Grimes, Brazos and eastern Washington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong slow moving line of thunderstorms between Brenham and Milican. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... College Station, Bryan, Brenham, Navasota, Bellville, Washington, Kurten, Wixon Valley, Millican, Kyle Field, Iola, Independence, Wellborn and Carlos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in League City.
